title: Quick Tuna Supper
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '1/2 fresh green pepper, sliced', '1/2 onion, thinly sliced', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '2 teaspoons dried rosemary (optional)', '120ml of tomato passata or ketchup', '3 tins tuna in water, drained']
